import React from 'react'; import { render } from 'react-dom'; import product from './Product' export default function Basket(props) { const { cartItems, onAdd, onRemove } = props; // fetch cartitems from props--> 8 {/* 10 */} const itemsPrice = cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.qty * c.price, 0); //--> 13 const taxPrice = itemsPrice * 0.14; //--> 14 const shippingPrice = itemsPrice > 2000 ? 0 : 20; //--> 15 const totalPrice = itemsPrice + taxPrice + shippingPrice; //--> 16 return (
